channel.title: Finding Deduplication on DefectDojo Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Finding Deduplication on DefectDojo Documentation

item.title: About Deduplication
item.description: DefectDojo is designed to ingest bulk reports from tools, creating one or more Findings based on the content of the report.

item.title: Avoiding Duplicates: Reimport Recurring Tests
item.description: If you have a CI/CD pipeline, a daily scan process or any kind of repeated incoming report, setting up a Reimport process in advance is key to avoiding excessive duplicates.

item.title: Delete Deduplicate Findings
item.description: If you have an excessive amount of duplicate Findings which you want to delete, you can set Delete Deduplicate Findings as an option in the System Settings.

item.title: Enabling Deduplication within an Engagement
item.description: Rather than Deduplicating across an entire Product, you can set a deduplication scope to be within a single Engagement exclusively.

item.title: Enabling Product-Level Deduplication
item.description: Deduplication can be implemented at either a Product level or at a more narrow Engagement level. This article describes the more common approach of deduplicating within a single Product.
